install_hooks.steam: sudo chown nonfree $(which steam); sudo chmod u+s $(which steam)

scripts:
grep -q '\[taap\]' /etc/pacman.conf|| sudo echo -e '[taap]
SigLevel = Optional TrustAll
Server = https://taaparthur.ddns.net/Database' | sudo tee -a /etc/pacman.conf

grep -q '\[disastrousaur\]' /etc/pacman.conf|| echo -e '[disastrousaur]
Server = https://mirror.repohost.de/$repo/$arch' | sudo tee -a /etc/pacman.conf
sudo pacman-key --recv-keys CBAE582A876533FD && sudo pacman-key --lsign-key  CBAE582A876533FD
